titleStmt.title: Pastoral admonitions directed by the Bishop of Cork to all under his charge ; whereunto is added A sermon reflecting on the late sufferings and deliverance of the Protestants in the said county and city, preached at White-Hall on the fourth Sunday in Lent, March 22, 1690.
titleStmt.author: Church of Ireland. Diocese of Cork and Ross. Bishop (1679-1699 : Wettenhall)
Wettenhall, Edward, 1636-1713.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Brent, for David Jones ...,

notesStmt.note: "A sermon preached at White-Hall, before the Queen, on the fourth Sunday in Lent, March 22. 1690" has special t.p. and separate paging.
Attributed to Wettenhall by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
